lines: Transcripted notes of Anna Creesy - Mapping of unnamed sea
Day 67 :
Got out of that neverending storm - Arrived on an island of fishermen - Locals don’t know much
Day 70 :
Strange streams - Unpredictable navigating conditions - Cannot locate myself easily - Backtrack when ship caught in strange streams - Need to be careful - Locals mentioned island north north-east
Day 89 :
Travel was long - Managed to get out of this maze - No help from locals - Talk in riddles - Don’t seem to understand what I want to achieve - It seems I’m on my own now - But not far from my goal
Day ??? :
Lost count of days - Don’t know where I am - Can’t backtrack
NOTES END HERE
